data.text: @jay_mara_13 @MorrisWisdom3 @nytimes Gain of function, is exactly what they did. Those emails are the real deal! He LIED TO ALL OF US!!

@Aaron_Is_Live @nytimes Indeed, they think by vomiting up old bs they can counfuse people about Fauci emails and fact we funded gain of function research. There is no doubt we did that. Mother Nature did not make Rono damn Lab in China did. Proof is there. Scientist shown nature didn’t do that. https://t.co/m1RNQHC2HY

@nytimes @nytimes  why would you share the results of a study that has not be scientifically proven to be published. Its common knowledge that such information is always taken as propaganda till verified scientifically. Its sad you are pertaking in it
@h4_why @nytimes You were over there and found this out firsthand?
@nytimes 太不要脸了！两年前的假新闻还发出来干嘛？没有职业道德也没有智商，你辞职吧，这份工作不适合你。
@nytimes How much you paid to post it? We all know USA lab is the birthplace of coronavirus.
@nytimes I think this is what China was saying but whoever was  representing us at the time (pre-Biden taking office) was having none of it.

@MorrisWisdom3 @nytimes At some point you’d think critical thinking skills would be used? I don’t think we will ever definitively find out based on Chinese transparency, but it’s the only city in the world doing Corona Virus research derived from bats. But it started in a fish market down the road?…ok
